text: Very nice orchid farm with beautiful flowers and helpful staff. The kind uncle helped to advise us on the flower arrangement and choice, and on selecting an appropriate pot. In arranging the flower he also consulted our opinions and gave advice on how to care for the flowers. 1 week on and my pot of orchids are healthy and happy, with 2 new shoots that have just appeared. Price is really reasonable, would highly recommend a visit! Do take note that some of their flowers have been pre-ordered, so you may not have a huge selection, but the remaining flowers that are available are still really beautiful.

Orchid plantation along Seletar West Farmway 7 specialises in varieties of Orchids including Hybrids and the famous National Flower Papilionnanthe Miss Joaquim. The Nusery shows and available for collection by Appointment. Good spot for scenic sunrise and sunset with breezy greenery away from busy cityscapes. Walking distance to The Animal Resort Farm with varieties of birds including Ostriches & Peacocks Tree House Flowers & Gifts Yee Peng Orchid Nursery Wee Lee Nursery & Florist Shavin Orchids Wholesaler Greenscape Plant Nursery Excelsior Florist Chwee Nursery Orchid Farm and Toh Kok Hwee Pet Shop. Short drive to Seletar Country Club with scenic views of lower Seletar Reservoir Golf courses and restaurants with local Western delights and Japanese cuisines. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students expats locals visitors and families.

Well- grown n healthy quality plants.
Owner friendly n approachable
Wide range of orchids. Onwer are friendly to talk to
Only open on weekends and public holidays?
